name: Doctrine Intake

description: Run all gates + council review across full engagement

description: Oracle of Soul Purpose counsel on soul alignment

name: Invoke Guardian
description: Guardian of Gaia counsel on earth stewardship

name: Invoke Architect
description: Architect of Sacred Systems counsel on sovereignty

name: Invoke Flame
description: Flame of Cultural Restoration counsel on cultural sensitivity

description: Weaver of Collective Futures counsel on consent and generational impact

name: Invoke Steward
description: Steward of Exchange counsel on fair value and reciprocity

name: Invoke Mirror
description: Mirror of the Multiverse counsel on shadow and timelines

name: Soul Gate Review
description: Does this align with soul purpose?

name: Earth Gate Review
description: Does this honor the physical world?

name: Consent Gate Review
description: Is there proper authority and informed consent?

name: Sovereignty Gate Review
description: Does this preserve independence and systemic integrity?

name: Four Gates Review
description: All 4 Sacred Gates combined review

name: Values Alignment
description: Score against 7 Divine Values

name: Ethics Alignment
description: Score against 7 Divine Ethics

name: Morals Check
description: Check against 7 Inviolable Morals (hard stop on violation)

name: Sacred Law Counsel
description: Consult relevant Sacred Laws from the 50

name: Full Alignment
description: Comprehensive: values + ethics + morals + gates

name: Legion Activation
description: Full Legion protective review

name: Shadow Integration
description: Shadow work using Klippot framework

name: Klippah Assessment
description: Identify which shells/distortions are present

name: Project Blessing
description: Ceremonial blessing for project launch

name: Milestone Blessing
description: Bless phase completion or milestone achievement

name: Alignment Certification
description: Formal certification of spiritual alignment

name: Quick Check
description: Quick alignment check against Living Light principles

name: Quick Counsel
description: Quick spiritual counsel on any question or concern
